knimeNode.name: Spark Concatenate
knimeNode.shortDescription: Concatenates Spark DataFrame/RDDs row wise, inputs are optional.

fullDescription.intro: This node concatenates Spark DataFrame/RDDs, inputs are optional. The Spark DataFrame/RDDs need to have the same structure e.q. column names and types in the same order.

ports.inPort: Spark DataFrame/RDD contributing the rows of the first part of the output Spark DataFrame/RDD.

inPort.name: Optional second Spark DataFrame/RDD to concatenate
Optional third Spark DataFrame/RDD to concatenate
Optional fourth Spark DataFrame/RDD to concatenate

ports.outPort: Spark DataFrame/RDD with rows from all input Spark DataFrame/RDDs.
